notice.ch: 中央主播同步遠距教學，與日本東京工業大學、土耳其中東科技及伊斯坦堡大學合作

goal.ch: Introduction about the technologies for earthquake disaster mitigation.
goal.en: Introduction about the technologies for earthquake disaster mitigation.

outline.ch:
"Special Lecture by Prof. Morikawa
9/28 10:00-11:30 (Must attend)
E-learning class
Time：9:00-10:30 (JST) 8:00-9:40 (CST)
(1) 10/ 7 Prof. Yamanaka (Earthquake)
(2) 10/14 Prof. Suzuki (Tsunami)
(3) 10/21 Prof. Hung (Geo-hazard, landslide)
(4) 10/28 Prof. Hsu (Steel structure)
(5) 11/ 4 Prof. Matsuoka (Remote sensing)
(6) 11/11 Prof. Lee (Dynamics of bridge)
(7) 11/18 Prof. Morikawa (Ground motion and ground structure)"
outline.en:
"Special Lecture by Prof. Morikawa

flexDiscription.ch: 16週週間需額外工作時間準備共5份期中、期末報告
flexDiscription.en: Additional working hours are necessary to prepare 5 reports including the middle and final reports.

ch.competencies: 策劃及執行專題研究之能力
研發創新及獨立解決問題之能力
跨領域協調整合之能力
國際觀及永續發展理念
領導、管理及規劃之能力
終身自我學習成長之能力

en.competencies: The Ability of Planning and Implementing Research Projects
The Ability in Writing Technical Papers
The Ability in Research, Innovation, and Problem Solving
The Ability of Interdisciplinary Integration and Coordination
International Perspective and Concept of Sustainable Development

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系碩士班、土木工程學系博士班。
學制:限學士班。年級:限三年級、四年級。
en: Department:MSc in Civil Engineering、PhD in Civil Engineering only.
Type:Undergraduate Program only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
